name: Final Fantasy VII Remake Episode INTERmission
name_original: Final Fantasy VII Remake Episode INTERmission
description: The new DLC starring Yuffie, is a brand-new adventure in the world of Final Fantasy VII Remake. You’ll venture into a brand-new adventure as Yuffie Kisaragi, a new playable character for this episode, accompanied by an NPC/Companion, Sonon Kusakabe. This ninja from Wutai sneaks her way into Midgar and devises a plan with Avalanche HQ for a thrilling mission to steal the ultimate materia from the Shinra Electric Power Company.
